TEXT.TITLE: MAY <MA> FEBRUARY RETAIL SALES INCREASE
TEXT.BODY: May Department Stores Co said its sales for the four weeks ended February 28 rose 15 pct to 631.8 mln dlrs from 549.5 mln dlrs a year ago. On a comparable-store basis, it was a 9.4 pct gain. Reuter
